title: Lalpa Isua ang turin
lyrics:
Lalpa Isua ang turin,
Khawvel dam chhung hian;
Pathian rawng chauh bawl turin,
Mahni inpe vekin.

Van atangin a lo chhuk,
Mihring min zawng turin;
A nunna zawng zawng a pe,
Kan bat tlakna turin.

Aw, Lal Isu sang turin (2)
Aw, Lal Isua, aw, Lal Isua,
Aw, Lal Isua ang turin.

Lalpa Isua ang turin,
Khawngaihnaa khatin,
Buaina fate pui turin,
Tanpui ngai apiangte,
Lalpa Isua ang turin,
Sualna a ngaidam thin;
Hmangaihna tawp nei lovin,
A thinlungah a liam.

Lalpa Isua ang turin,
Tawngtaina hmang thain;
A pa hnenah dil turin,
Tlangah a lawn fo thin.
Khawhar takin chutah chuan,
A tawngtai zankhua thin;
A pa duhzawng tih tur chu,
A chaw tui ber a ni.
